entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:57 PM EST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
